Package games.negative.alumina.util

Interface Tasks

public interface Tasks
The Tasks interface provides static methods to schedule tasks in a Bukkit server environment.

  • Method Summary

    Static Methods
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static org.bukkit.scheduler.BukkitTask
    async(@NotNull Runnable runnable)
    Runs the given Runnable asynchronously on a separate thread.
    static org.bukkit.scheduler.BukkitTask
    async(@NotNull Runnable runnable, long delay)
    Runs the given Runnable asynchronously on a separate thread after a delay.
    static org.bukkit.scheduler.BukkitTask
    async(@NotNull Runnable runnable, long delay, long period)
    Runs the given Runnable asynchronously on a separate thread with a delay and at a specific interval.
    static <T> CompletableFuture<T>
    await(@NotNull Callable<T> callable)
    Executes the given Callable on a separate thread and returns a CompletableFuture that represents the result.
    static org.bukkit.scheduler.BukkitTask
    run(@NotNull Runnable runnable)
    Runs the given Runnable on the main thread of the Bukkit server.

    Runs the given Runnable on the main thread after a delay.

  • Method Details

    • run

      static org.bukkit.scheduler.BukkitTask run(@NotNull @NotNull Runnable runnable)
      Runs the given Runnable on the main thread of the Bukkit server.
      Parameters:
      runnable - The Runnable to be executed.
      Returns:
      The BukkitTask representing the scheduled task.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the runnable is null.

    • run

      static org.bukkit.scheduler.BukkitTask run(@NotNull @NotNull Runnable runnable, long delay)
      Runs the given Runnable on the main thread after a delay.
      Parameters:
      runnable - The Runnable to be executed.
      delay - The delay in ticks before the Runnable is executed.
      Returns:
      The BukkitTask representing the scheduled task.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the runnable is null.

    • run

      static org.bukkit.scheduler.BukkitTask run(@NotNull @NotNull Runnable runnable, long delay, long period)
      Runs the given Runnable on the main thread after a delay and at a specific interval.
      Parameters:
      runnable - The Runnable to be executed.
      delay - The delay in ticks before the Runnable is first executed.
      period - The interval in ticks between subsequent executions of the Runnable.
      Returns:
      The BukkitTask representing the scheduled task.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the runnable is null.

      Returns:

      Throws:

    • async

      static org.bukkit.scheduler.BukkitTask async(@NotNull @NotNull Runnable runnable, long delay, long period)
      Runs the given Runnable asynchronously on a separate thread with a delay and at a specific interval.
      Parameters:
      runnable - The Runnable to be executed.
      delay - The delay in ticks before the Runnable is executed.
      period - The interval in ticks between subsequent executions of the Runnable.
      Returns:
      The BukkitTask representing the scheduled task.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the runnable is null.

    • await

      static <T> CompletableFuture<T> await(@NotNull @NotNull Callable<T> callable)
      Executes the given Callable on a separate thread and returns a CompletableFuture that represents the result.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the result.
      Parameters:
      callable - The Callable to be executed.
      Returns:
      A CompletableFuture that will complete with the result of the Callable.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the callable is null.
